PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-16372011-12-15,  ,  CIC,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of RUTH DELISLE of Saint-Laurent, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montreal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of six months or a period expiring on the day prior to the coming into force of the Balance Refugee Reform Act, whichever period ends earlier, effective January 3, 2012.
